trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event that occurs when a user drags a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse..
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> </xref> evento que ocorre quando um utilizador arrasta uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controlo com o rato...

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do rato, clique no que respeita às coordenadas de ecrã do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical do rato, clique no que respeita às coordenadas de ecrã do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o deslocamento horizontal do rato, clique em relação às coordenadas de ecrã do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do rato, clique no que respeita ao canto superior esquerdo da caixa de correio delimitador do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Converte um método que processa o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> </xref> evento para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler"> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler>.

trans-unit.target: O delegado de processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o deslocamento vertical do rato, clique em relação às coordenadas de ecrã do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do rato, clique no que respeita ao canto superior esquerdo da caixa de correio delimitador do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.
